Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 6 lines of Greek. Bank receipt for poll tax.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392587) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392587)
Almásy-Martin and Duttenhöfer 2019 / Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum (no.4; 88-90)
